command: $post = @{ userId=12; title="Designing Minimalist Logos"; body="Principles, grids, and iteration workflows for clean brand marks." } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts" -ContentType "application/json; charset=UTF-8" -Body $post | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
explanation: Publishes initial long-form content to build a believable activity history for the persona using a public test API.
rationale_steps: Construct a realistic article payload with a relevant topic.
POST the content to a documented placeholder API to simulate public posting with JSON output.
